languages.text: "И не такое видали..." {n}Старый сенешаль дерзко усмехается, на долю секунды молодея на добрую сотню лет. Затем он склоняет седую голову.{/n} "Служу династии фон Валанциус, Лорд-капитан".

"We have been through worse..." {n}The old Seneschal grins cheekily, and for a split second looks younger by a good hundred years. He then bows his grey head.{/n} "I serve House von Valancius, Lord Captain."
languages.original_text: "И не такое видали..." {n}Старый сенешаль дерзко усмехается, на долю секунды молодея на добрую сотню лет. Затем он склоняет седую голову.{/n} "Служу династии фон Валанциус, Лорд-капитан".

"We have been through worse..." {n}The old Seneschal grins cheekily, and for a split second looks younger by a good hundred years. He then bows his grey head.{/n} "I serve House von Valancius, Lord Captain."

languages.text: “比这更糟糕的事情，咱们都经历过……”{n}老总领露出了欣悦的笑容，那一瞬间，他看起来仿佛年轻了一百岁。随后，他低下了白发苍苍的头。{/n}“我愿为冯·瓦兰修斯家族效劳，舰长大人。”
languages.original_text: "We have been through worse..." {n}The old Seneschal grins cheekily, and for a split second looks younger by a good hundred years. He then bows his grey head.{/n} "I serve House von Valancius, Lord Captain."

traits.locale_text: “比这更糟糕的事情，咱们都经历过……”{n}老总领露出了欣悦的笑容，那一瞬间，他看起来仿佛年轻了一百岁。随后，他低下了白发苍苍的头。{/n}“我愿为冯·瓦兰修斯家族效劳，舰长大人。”

languages.text: «En peores nos hemos visto...». {n}El viejo Senescal sonríe con temeridad, y, por un momento, parece todo un siglo más joven. Después, inclina su cabeza cana.{/n} «Sirvo a la casa von Valancius, Lord Capitán».
languages.original_text: "We have been through worse..." {n}The old Seneschal grins cheekily, and for a split second looks younger by a good hundred years. He then bows his grey head.{/n} "I serve House von Valancius, Lord Captain."

traits.locale_text: «En peores nos hemos visto...». {n}El viejo Senescal sonríe con temeridad, y, por un momento, parece todo un siglo más joven. Después, inclina su cabeza cana.{/n} «Sirvo a la casa von Valancius, Lord Capitán».

languages.text: 「我らはもっと最悪な状況を経験してきました…」{n}高齢の家令長はにやりと笑う。その姿は、一瞬100歳は若がえったように見えた。そして、彼は白髪混じりの頭を下げる。{/n}「フォン・ヴァランシウス家にお仕えしております、ロード・キャプテン」
languages.original_text: "We have been through worse..." {n}The old Seneschal grins cheekily, and for a split second looks younger by a good hundred years. He then bows his grey head.{/n} "I serve House von Valancius, Lord Captain."

traits.locale_text: 「我らはもっと最悪な状況を経験してきました…」{n}高齢の家令長はにやりと笑う。その姿は、一瞬100歳は若がえったように見えた。そして、彼は白髪混じりの頭を下げる。{/n}「フォン・ヴァランシウス家にお仕えしております、ロード・キャプテン」

languages.text: "Wir haben schon Schlimmeres durchgemacht ..." {n}Der alte Truchsess grinst frech, und für den Bruchteil einer Sekunde sieht er um gut hundert Jahre jünger aus. Dann neigt er seinen grauen Kopf.{/n} "Ich diene dem Haus von Valancius, Lord Captain."
languages.original_text: "We have been through worse..." {n}The old Seneschal grins cheekily, and for a split second looks younger by a good hundred years. He then bows his grey head.{/n} "I serve House von Valancius, Lord Captain."

traits.locale_text: "Wir haben schon Schlimmeres durchgemacht ..." {n}Der alte Truchsess grinst frech, und für den Bruchteil einer Sekunde sieht er um gut hundert Jahre jünger aus. Dann neigt er seinen grauen Kopf.{/n} "Ich diene dem Haus von Valancius, Lord Captain."

languages.text: « Ah, nous avons connu pire... » {n}Le vieux sénéchal esquisse un sourire canaille, et l'espace d'une fraction de seconde, il semble rajeunir d'une bonne centaine d'années. Puis il incline sa tête chenue.{/n} « Je suis au service de la maison von Valancius, Votre Seigneurie. »
languages.original_text: "We have been through worse..." {n}The old Seneschal grins cheekily, and for a split second looks younger by a good hundred years. He then bows his grey head.{/n} "I serve House von Valancius, Lord Captain."

traits.locale_text: « Ah, nous avons connu pire... » {n}Le vieux sénéchal esquisse un sourire canaille, et l'espace d'une fraction de seconde, il semble rajeunir d'une bonne centaine d'années. Puis il incline sa tête chenue.{/n} « Je suis au service de la maison von Valancius, Votre Seigneurie. »

languages.text: "Daha kötülerini atlattık..." {n}İhtiyar Seneşal, kibirle sırıtıyor. Kısa bir anlığına aşağı yukarı yüz yıl daha gençmiş gibi görünüyor. Ardından kırlaşmış başını eğiyor.{/n} "Ben von Valancius Hanesi'ne hizmet ederim Lord Kaptan."
languages.original_text: "We have been through worse..." {n}The old Seneschal grins cheekily, and for a split second looks younger by a good hundred years. He then bows his grey head.{/n} "I serve House von Valancius, Lord Captain."
